sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Card = ({ giver, receiver }) => { return (

{giver.name.first + " " + giver.name.last}

{giver.motto}

{giver.email}

{giver.location}

{giver.department}

{receiver.name.first + " " + receiver.name.last}

{receiver.motto}

{receiver.email}

{receiver.location}

{receiver.department}

) } export default Card;
